item.description: I saw a link to this YouTube video shared on Tom Limoncelli’s blog. It’s a 1953 US Navy instructional video about an all-mechanical fire control computer. item.title: Mediawiki Extension - Section Link To Top
item.description:
While working on a particularly long documentation page in MediaWiki today, I came by a convenient little extension:

Section Link To Top

It adds a nice little “top” link next to the “edit” link in each section header. Very useful for long pages.
